channel.title: Where can i find commands and how can i make myself a mod?
channel.description: i just made a server and i dont really know crap, so please help i need to know how to find item numbers and stuff like that, please help :(

item.title: Where can i find commands and how can i make myself a mod?
item.dc:creator: @I_0ne_H1t_K0 I 0ne H1t K0
item.description:
@I_0ne_H1t_K0 wrote:

For Commands :
Just Search For Commands You Should Find A Couple Of Random Things
Then You Should Find A List Of Your Commands

For Mod, Admin Or Owner :

Go Into Your Source
Should Be A File Named “characters” Open That Find The Username Your Using And Where It Says

[CHARACTER]
character-height = 0
character-posx = 3353
character-posy = 3251
character-rights = 0 <<<<<<<<<<<<< Change The 0 To Either 1, 2 Or 3
character-ismember = 1 (1 Is Mod, 2 Is Admin And 3 Is Owner)
character-messages = 0
character-lastconnection = …
character-lastlogin = 20070301
character-energy = 14
character-gametime = 0
character-gamecount = 1141

Read full topic
item.source: Where can i find commands and how can i make myself a mod?

item.title: Where can i find commands and how can i make myself a mod?
item.dc:creator: @Zzz_O_zzZ Zzz O zzZ
item.description:
@Zzz_O_zzZ wrote:

There should be a character file. Click it and find the username you use. Then change playerrights to 2.

For commands edit client.java (Notepad should open)

Press “ctrl f” search for command. Then you will find them listed usually.

Read full topic
item.source: Where can i find commands and how can i make myself a mod?

item.title: Where can i find commands and how can i make myself a mod?
item.dc:creator: @Zenzie Zenzie
item.description:
@Zenzie wrote:

go into your source

charathers > your name > playerrights = 0;

change to 0 to what you wnat to be

0 = normal player

1 = silver crown mod

2 = admin

3 = owner

Read full topic
